remarks: Write a double restricted quantification as one universal quantifier. In this version of ~ ralxp , ` B ( y ) ` is not assumed to be constant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ralxp.1 $e |- ( x = <. y , z >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
raliunxp $p |- ( A. x e. U_ y e. A ( { y } X. B ) ph <-> A. y e. A A. z e. B ps ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x z $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x $.
